name: nexus IT group
overview:
nexus IT group is an up-and-coming IT consulting and recruiting firm in Kansas City that has experienced industry leading growth year-over-year since our conception.

To nexus IT group placement is an art—one that requires the proper alignment of talent with opportunity, experience with need, personality with environment, and aspirations with value.

At nexus IT group, we partner with small growing startups to Fortune 15 size organizations with exceptional technology talent in IT infrastructure, IT security, IT communications, and desktop, web, and mobile development.

Our clients rely on us for custom solutions to meet their needs, and we bring together our knowledge, expertise and responsiveness to form and maintain enduring relationships. Our goal at nexus IT group is to generate candidates that are a great match for the client resulting in time savings and employment longevity.
